newsitem.title: USA: GSE Systems unit files trade secret suit.
newsitem.headline: GSE Systems unit files trade secret suit.

text.p: GSE Systems Inc said on Friday its GSE Power Systems Inc subsidiary filed a lawsuit accusing J.L. Ryan Inc, North Coast Software Inc and other defendants of infringing GSE's intellectual property rights.
Neither J.L. Ryan, of Columbia, Md., nor North Coast Software, of Oswego, N.Y., would comment Friday on the lawsuit, filed in U.S. District Court in Baltimore.
GSE's suit accuses the defendants of software copyright infringement and misappropriation of trade secrets in connection with their distribution of "OpenSim" software.
GSE Power Systems supplies simulation systems to electric utility industry customers.
